keel.Algorithms.Fuzzy_Rule_Learning.Genetic.Shared.Algorithms

Class GeneticAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Fuzzy_Rule_Learning.Genetic.Shared.Algorithms.GeneticAlgorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlgorithmGAPGen, AlgorithmGAPNiches, AlgorithmGAPSteady, GeneticAlgorithmGenerational, GeneticAlgorithmSteady, SimulatedAnnealing

    public abstract class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object

    GeneticAlgorithm is the base clase for all genetic algorithm and programming algorithms, including the simulate annealing based one. This class is inherit by the following classes: AlgorithmGAPGen, AlgorithmGAPNiches, AlgorithmGAPSteady, GeneticAlgorithmGenerational, GeneticAlgorithmSteady and SimulatedAnnealing.

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Written by Luciano Sanchez (University of Oviedo) 20/01/2004, Modified by J.R. Villar (University of Oviedo) 19/12/2008

    • Method Detail

      • evolve

        public abstract GeneticIndividual evolve(int MAXITER)
                                  throws invalidCrossover,
                                         invalidMutation,
                                         invalidOptim

        abstract method for evolving the algorithm for a given number of iterations.

        Parameters:
        MAXITER - an integer with the number of iterations torun in the evolucion
        Returns:
        the best GeneticIndividual found
        Throws:
        invalidCrossover - in case of unsupported crossover.
        invalidMutation - in case of unsupported mutation.
        invalidOptim - in case of local optimization operations.
